welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Nolensville! Known for its quaint downtown and southern hospitality, we invite you to explore our town and experience all that it has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Smyrna Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nashville International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Nashville International Airport serves domestic flights for Air Canada, American Airlines, and Delta.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Nashville International Airport serves domestic flights for Alaska Airlines, JetBlue, Southwest, and United.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Nashville International Airport serves domestic flights for Allegiant, Frontier, and Spirit.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.
